content:
isaacvetter commented on Issue #266:

@wmaethner - love the diagrams! Two questions/suggestions:

1) You're committing just the images of the diagrams, not the source materials, such that editing them would require re-creating them. Can you also commit the source (for example, if you were using websequencediagrams.com, the textual representation of the diagram in a text file).

2) Your denial diagram strongly implies that a denial will only and ever immediately follow a subscription request. Our spec, as well as the WebSub spec are clear that a denial may occur at any time, even after having successfully sent notifications. What do you think about updating the diagram's text callout, to something like this:

App subscribes to hub. Hub denies subscription. This denial may occur at any time, even after a successful intent verification or event notifications.

wmaethner commented on Issue #266:

Hey @isaacvetter,

I think I shared the diagrams and referenced them the same way you did in the other PR. Let me know if I missed anything.

-Will
